title: LumaFusion vs DaVinci Resolve: Which iPad video editor should you use?
description: Looking to upgrade from iMovie, but not sure which video editor to choose for your iPad? Here's how to decide.

title: What is a Gmail app password and how do you create one?
description: If third-party apps need to connect to your Gmail account, your regular Google account password may not be enough. Find out how to use the App Passwords feature and why.

title: Get your hands on the awesome Blackview MP60 Windows 11 Pro Mini PC for as little as $150
description: It's a tiny PC with lots of power and tons of possibilities -- and it's not a Raspberry Pi.

title: How to keep the Android lock screen from displaying sensitive content
description: Concerned about prying eyes seeing sensitive messages on your Android phone's lock screen? Find out how to prevent that from happening.

title: How to allow specific users to bypass Do Not Disturb on Android
description: If you want certain people to be able to reach you even with your Android phone set to Do Not Disturb, it's much easier to set up than you think.

title: 'Find something you're passionate about.' Five ways to build a career path that works for you
description: Five experts outline the best ways for young professionals to boost their resumes.

title: Fastest way to access iPhone camera: Change this one awesome setting
description: iPhone power tip: Sick of missing your shot because you couldn't open your camera in time? Here's how to fix that.

title: Alibaba names new CTO, while CEO steps in as interim cloud head
description: Chinese tech giant appoints Wu Zeming as its CTO, replacing Li Cheng, while CEO and chairman Daniel Zhang adds acting president of Alibaba's cloud business to his portfolio, in a series of top management changes that the company says is an annual routine.
